attributes.action: Block all travel to and from countries with High Ebola Risks
attributes.additional_details:
We ask the DoT and the DoH, as well as the whole Government, to contemplate Blocking travel and Grounding flights to countries that have been proven to be a high risk threat of contracting Ebola.

The only exception for this is if aid workers are going to help with the effort there. Having said that, upon their departure from that country, they must be immediately tested for Ebola and if contracted, receive treatment in that country before returning to avoid any national risk to the UK.
